com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm

Class Friends

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracehoppers.jlovas.bookwrm.Friends
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Friends
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A list of Accounts that act as the friend list for the user. Includes a getter and ways to add or remove a friend account, check if it has a friend, clear the list, or look for a friend by index number
    See Also:
    Account, Serialized Form

        public int addFriend(Account newFriend)
              throws AlreadyAddedException
        Adds a new friend into the list, but if the friend has already been added, it throws the AlreadyAddedException
        Parameters:
        newFriend - - the friend being put into the list
        Returns:
        int - shows success
        Throws:
        AlreadyAddedException

      • unFriend

        public void unFriend(java.lang.String username)
        removes the friend account from the list
        Parameters:
        username - - the friend account being removed

      • hasFriend

        public boolean hasFriend(Account friend)
        Checks to see if the list contains the friend account given in the parameter
        Parameters:
        friend - - the friend account being checked
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the list does have this friend account

      • getFriendByIndex

        public java.lang.String getFriendByIndex(int i)
                                  throws NegativeNumberException,
                                         TooLongException
        returns the friend at the index given by the parameter. Throws a TooLongException if the parameter int is longer than the list size, throws NegativeNumberException if the int parameter is negative
        Parameters:
        i - - the position in the list to check
        Returns:
        Account - the account at the given position
        Throws:
        NegativeNumberException
        TooLongException
